mapper.insert: INSERT INTO key_store ( key_store_id, user_id, public_key, private_key, refresh_token, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( COALESCE(#{keyStoreId}, gen_random_uuid()), #{userId}, #{publicKey}, #{privateKey}, #{refreshToken}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET public_key = EXCLUDED.public_key, private_key = EXCLUDED.private_key, refresh_token = EXCLUDED.refresh_token, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
